item.title: Apollo, Ares Eye Bigger Role Backing Sports Leagues, Teams
item.description: Apollo Global Management Inc. and Ares Management Corp. are both pushing deeper into sports investing, the latest multibillion-dollar alternative asset managers to put more money into the booming sect
